title: Japanese boy: the story of Taro
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and William Deneen
brief_description: Uses the story of a Japanese boy, who learns the meaning of sacrifice, to reveal the attitudes, customs and problems of a farm family and to offer insights into the Japanese character. Suitable for primary level.
